metadata.title: CVE-2021-42326 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.1.5 and 4.2.x before 4.2.3 may disclose the names of userson activity views due to an insufficient access filter.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
